snippet: In Bristol, Conn., Mayor Arthur J. Ward has been locked in a conflict with local firefighters, who want to wear pink T-shirts on the job as part of a fund-raiser to promote breast cancer awareness.
abstract: Mayor Arthur J Ward of Bristol, Conn, is locked in a conflict with local firefighters who want to wear pink t-shirts on the job as part of a breast cancer awareness campaign; Ward has rejected request, citing contract clause requiring that firefighters wear blue uniform shirts.
lead_paragraph: In Bristol, Conn., Mayor Arthur J. Ward has been locked in a conflict with local firefighters, who want to wear pink T-shirts on the job as part of a fund-raiser to promote breast cancer awareness.

headline.seo: Bristol, Conn., Mayor Bans Pink T-Shirts for Firefighters
headline.main: Firefighters vs. Town Leader Over Pink Shirts for a Cause
headline.print_headline: Firefighters vs. Town Leader Over Pink Shirts for a Cause
